definitions: assorted tools, especially ones required for a mechanized process

examples.text: the tooling costs for the latest Ford Fiesta

definitions: the process of making or working something with tools

examples.text: the deck molding showed some tooling marks

shortDefinitions: process of making or working something with tools

definitions: the ornamentation of a leather book cover with designs impressed by heated tools

examples.text: ornaments ready to use in the gold tooling of fine bindings

shortDefinitions: ornamentation of leather book cover with designs impressed by heated tools
